entries.npc_1_1: I've been a museum curator for many years, and on this planet we found the oldest tomb I've ever seen.  Unfortunately some grave robbers took the artifact I was studying.  If you would be so kind, perhaps you can get it back?
entries.npc_2_1: You look like a good man.  I'll make it worth your while.
entries.npc_3_1: Well, certainly there are other artifacts.  Too bad, this one was really good...
entries.npc_4_1: It was an ancient ritual device of some sort.  I need to study it further to find out exactly what it was for.
entries.npc_1_2: I've been researching animals, but an industrial spy stole one of my cages.  It still had some cell structures in it from the creature.  I need it back before he figures out what's in it.  Can you help me?
entries.npc_3_2: I guess I'm wasting my time with you then.  Do you know anyone who DOES work?
entries.npc_4_2: That's highly classified.  That's why I need that evidence back before someone finds out what I was doing.  You don't have a problem with this do you?
entries.npc_1_3: There's an assassin on this planet who's been killing all the top scientists in the area.  I want him eliminated and I'm willing to pay well for it.  Can you do it?
entries.npc_2_3: I thought so.  You look like a good person. I'll make it worth your while.
entries.npc_3_3: Well, there are other artifacts.  Too bad, this one was really good...
entries.npc_4_3: No one knows.  He seems to have some sort of problem with the work that we do, but we don't know why.
entries.npc_1_4: One of our assistants has gone mad and is planning on releasing a toxin into the air that would kill all the plant life on this planet.  He must be stopped.  I can tell you where he is if you can stop him.
entries.npc_2_4: Thanks.  I really appreciate it.  I'll find something to give you when you return.
entries.npc_3_4: Great.  I'm wasting my time with you then.  Do you know anyone who DOES work?
entries.npc_4_4: It's a highly classified agent that we were using to destroy poisonous plants, but he's modified it to kill all vegetable matter.
entries.npc_1_5: One of my colleagues has managed to get lost just outside of town.  It would be a great help to me if you could get my partner back to this location. Can you do that?
entries.npc_2_5: Thank you so much.  I'll make contact so there aren't any surprises.
entries.npc_3_5: That's too bad.  Guess I'm on my own for now.
entries.npc_4_5: Something's wrong with the datapad, and it can't seem to be used to navigate anymore.
entries.npc_1_6: One of my fellow scientists has damaged navigational equipment and needs someone to bring them back to me here.  Can you help us out?
entries.npc_2_6: Excellent.  I'll be waiting here, and when you've returned we'll make sure you get something for your efforts.
entries.npc_3_6: Too bad.  If you know anyone who can help send them my way.
entries.npc_4_6: To be honest, scientists can be rather clumsy.  I'm not really going to say anything more than that though.
entries.npc_reward_1: Here you go, these are very rare, and could be worth a lot if you can find a buyer.
entries.npc_reward_2: Here you go.  I found this nice picture of the creature I was studying.  It's really all I have to give you though.
entries.npc_reward_3: Here you go, these bugs are very rare, and could be worth a lot if you can find a buyer.
entries.npc_reward_4: Here you go.  I found this great picture of the creature I was studying.  It's really all I have to give you though.
entries.npc_reward_5: Here you go, these bugs are extremely rare, and could be worth a lot if you can find a buyer.
entries.npc_reward_6: Here you go.  I found this picture of the creature I was studying.  It's really all I have to give you though.
entries.player_1_1: Yeah, I can get it.  I hate grave robbers.
entries.player_2_1: I don't care about artifacts.  Forget it.
entries.player_1_2: I'll get it back.  Industrial espionage is a terrible thing.
entries.player_2_2: I couldn't care less about you and your problem.
entries.player_3_2: What kind of creatures were you studying?
entries.player_1_4: I'll stop this guy before he gets started.
entries.player_2_4: Oh, my, I couldn't care less about you and your problem.
entries.player_1_5: Sure.  I'll bring your friend back.
entries.player_2_5: No thanks.  I've got other things to do.
entries.player_3_5: Why don't you upload your location to the datapad?
entries.player_2_6: Oh my, I couldn't care less about you and your problem.
entries.npc_takeme_5: Oh, you've arrived.  Ok, you lead the way back and I'll follow you.
entries.not_it: No, sorry, that's not the item I was looking for...
entries.gotowork: I need you to finish that task I gave you earlier.  Ok?
entries.cantwork: I understand you're already working for someone else.  Come back when you're done with that job.
entries.otherescort: I don't think I'm the one you're looking for.  Perhaps you should be escorting someone else?
entries.dontknowyou: I'm sorry, but I don't know who you are and I'm not going to follow you anywhere!
entries.player_2_3: I don't think I'm up to that.
entries.npc_breech_1: Did the "curator" send you?  Hah!  Die scum!
entries.npc_breech_2: My company will pay well for this!
entries.npc_breech_3: Do you work for the scientists?  Then you'll die like they do!
entries.npc_breech_4: You can't stop me!  I'll kill everyone!
entries.return: The Scientist who gave you this job is eagerly awaiting your return.
entries.npc_reset: Ok, I'll let you off the hook.
entries.npc_backtowork: Get to it then.  I need that job done.
entries.npc_noloc_1: Come back in a few minutes and I should have more information for you.
entries.npc_noloc_2: Luckily I put a tracer in the cage. Come back in a few minutes and I should have some coordinates for you.
entries.npc_noloc_3: Let me see if I can find out exactly where he is. Come back in a while and I should have more info.
entries.npc_noloc_4: I'm waiting for his roommate to call me with his location, come back in a few minutes.
entries.npc_noloc_5: Let me see if I can find out exactly where he is. Come back in a while and I should have more info.
entries.npc_noloc_6: Let me see if I can find out exactly where he is. Come back in a while and I should have more info.
